subject: Television
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: From Weeks 10 to 15, and on Week 17, NBC will be able to swap the game perched tentatively on its schedule for one now on CBS’s or Fox’s menus.
snippet: From Weeks 10 to 15, and on Week 17, NBC will be able to swap the game perched tentatively on its schedule for one now on CBS’s or Fox’s menus.
